name: Sandwyrm
description: The Sandwyrm is a large, formidable dragon with powerful spines along its back and a sandy, scaled body that allows it to blend into desert environments. Its burrowing capabilities make it adept at ambush tactics.
memorable: Its unique ability to restrain foes with its Spine Trap while hidden in sand makes it a distinct threat on the battlefield.
goals: To ambush prey and control its environment using burrowing and stealth.
relations: May be encountered alongside other desert creatures or as a solitary predator.
environment: Usually found in sandy deserts or similar arid environments.
strengths: High hit points and strong melee attacks make it a durable opponent. Its burrowing ability enhances its ambush tactics.
weaknesses: Low intelligence indicates a lack of strategic planning in combat.
attacks: Multiattack features Bite, Gore, and Stinger attacks that deal piercing damage and can inflict debilitating poison.
most_powerful_ability: Spine Trap allows it to restrain opponents, controlling battlefield dynamics effectively.
senses: The Sandwyrm has tremorsense that allows it to detect vibrations up to 120 feet away, enhancing its ambush capabilities.
skills: It possesses strong skill proficiencies in Perception, enabling it to notice hidden targets effectively.
additional_information: Stealth score of +4 makes it adept at hiding.
Intelligence is exceptionally low, resulting in poor strategic capabilities.
Poison from Stinger can render targets paralyzed.
In combat, it can combine multiple attacks with poison effects.
test_queries: large dragon that burrows in sand
ambush predator with powerful melee attacks
dragon that hides beneath the sand
monster that restrains with back spines
